languages.text: "Даже Вольный Торговец не смеет манипулировать тем, с чем имеем дело мы!" {n}Голос дознавателя превращается в рычание.{/n} "Ты подвергаешь каждую душу на своем корабле невероятной опасности!"

traits.locale_text: "Даже Вольный Торговец не смеет манипулировать тем, с чем имеем дело мы!" {n}Голос дознавателя превращается в рычание.{/n} "Ты подвергаешь каждую душу на своем корабле невероятной опасности!"

languages.text: "Even Rogue Traders should not dabble in what we are dealing with now!" {n}His voice turns into a growl.{/n} "You are putting every soul aboard your ship in grave peril!"
languages.original_text: "Даже Вольный Торговец не смеет манипулировать тем, с чем имеем дело мы!" {n}Голос дознавателя превращается в рычание.{/n} "Ты подвергаешь каждую душу на своем корабле невероятной опасности!"

traits.locale_text: "Even Rogue Traders are not to dabble in what we are dealing with now!" {n}His voice turns into a growl.{/n} "You are putting every soul aboard your ship in grave peril!"
"Even Rogue Traders are not to dabble in what we are dealing with now!" {n}His voice turns into a growl.{/n} "You are putting every soul aboard your ship in grave peril!"
"Even Rogue Traders should not dabble in what we are dealing with now!" {n}His voice turns into a growl.{/n} "You are putting every soul aboard your ship in grave peril!"
"Even Rogue Traders should not dabble in what we are dealing with now!" {n}His voice turns into a growl.{/n} "You are putting every soul aboard your ship in grave peril!"
"Even Rogue Traders should not dabble in what we are dealing with now!" {n}His voice turns into a growl.{/n} "You are putting every soul aboard your ship in grave peril!"

languages.text: 「自由開拓者といえども、我らが今相手にしていることに手を出すべきではない！」{n}彼の声は低い唸り声に変わった。{/n}「陛下は船に乗っているすべての者を重大な危険にさらしているんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Even Rogue Traders should not dabble in what we are dealing with now!" {n}His voice turns into a growl.{/n} "You are putting every soul aboard your ship in grave peril!"

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者といえども、我らが今相手にしていることに手を出すべきではない！」{n}彼の声は低い唸り声に変わった。{/n}「陛下は船に乗っているすべての者を重大な危険にさらしているんだ！」

languages.text: « Même les libres-marchands ne devraient pas s'aventurer sur ce terrain ! {n}Sa voix se mue en un grognement.{/n} Vous mettez en danger la vie de toutes les personnes à bord de votre vaisseau ! »
languages.original_text: "Even Rogue Traders should not dabble in what we are dealing with now!" {n}His voice turns into a growl.{/n} "You are putting every soul aboard your ship in grave peril!"

traits.locale_text: « Même les libres-marchands ne devraient pas s'aventurer sur ce terrain ! {n}Sa voix se mue en un grognement.{/n} « Vous mettez en danger la vie de toutes les personnes à bord de votre vaisseau ! »

languages.text: “即便是行商浪人，也不该插手这样的事情！”{n}海因里希咆哮起来。{/n}“你这么做，会将你所有的船员置于危险之中！”
languages.original_text: "Even Rogue Traders should not dabble in what we are dealing with now!" {n}His voice turns into a growl.{/n} "You are putting every soul aboard your ship in grave peril!"

traits.locale_text: “即便是行商浪人，也不该插手这样的事情！”{n}海因里希咆哮起来。{/n}“你这么做，会将你所有的船员置于危险之中！”

languages.text: «¡Esto no está hecho para {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente!». {n}Su voz se convierte en un rugido.{/n} «¡Está poniendo en peligro a todas las almas que tripulan su nave!».
languages.original_text: "Even Rogue Traders should not dabble in what we are dealing with now!" {n}His voice turns into a growl.{/n} "You are putting every soul aboard your ship in grave peril!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Esto no está hecho para {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente!». {n}Su voz se convierte en un rugido.{/n} «¡Está poniendo en peligro a todas las almas que tripulan su nave!».

languages.text: "Selbst Freihändler sollten sich nicht in solche Dinge einmischen!" {n}Seine Stimme verkommt zu einem Knurren.{/n} "Ihr bringt jede einzelne Seele an Bord Eures Schiffs in schwere Gefahr!"
languages.original_text: "Even Rogue Traders should not dabble in what we are dealing with now!" {n}His voice turns into a growl.{/n} "You are putting every soul aboard your ship in grave peril!"

traits.locale_text: "Selbst Freihändler sollten sich nicht in solche Dinge einmischen!" {n}Seine Stimme verkommt zu einem Knurren.{/n} "Ihr bringt jede einzelne Seele an Bord Eures Schiffs in schwere Gefahr!"

languages.text: "Hür Tacirler dahi karşı karşıya olduğumuz sapkınlığa bulaşmamalı!" {n}Sesi, vahşi bir hayvanın hırlamasını andırıyor.{/n} "Gemideki herkesin kaderini tehlikeye atıyorsun!"
languages.original_text: "Even Rogue Traders should not dabble in what we are dealing with now!" {n}His voice turns into a growl.{/n} "You are putting every soul aboard your ship in grave peril!"

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacirler dahi karşı karşıya olduğumuz sapkınlığa bulaşmamalı!" {n}Sesi, vahşi bir hayvanın hırlamasını andırıyor.{/n} "Geminizdeki herkesin kaderini tehlikeye atıyorsunuz!"
